sections.title: About me
sections.text: My name is Gustavo. I like to program and I am interested in 3D graphics and creative coding in general. Here are some of my projects. I hope you like them!

sections.title: Games
sections.text: Here are some games/engines that I made (mostly in C++).

items.name: Magnolia
items.text: A 3D game engine with a Vulkan rendering backend. Written in c++.

items.name: Debtale
items.text: A 3D harvesting sim where you grow and sell flowers to pay off debt.

items.name: F90
items.text: A 3rd person shooter made with my Bloss1 engine.

items.name: Tick Invasion
items.text: A top down shooter where you fight ticks to save the park. Made for the tiny creatures LudumDare 56 game jam.

items.name: ElJuego
items.text: A mech shoot 'em up made in Godot.

items.name: The Vops
items.text: A devops inspired resource management game made for the build to scale GMTK 2024 game jam.

sections.title: Computer Graphics
sections.text: Here are some projects focused on computer graphics.

items.name: Chroma
items.text: A browser-based tool for learning computer graphics.

sections.title: Artifacts
sections.text: These are some other projects that are not directly related to games or computer graphics.

items.text: Polybar and Eww configs for the i3 window manager
